parameters.html:
A SPACE10 project in collaboration with oio.

How can AI assist designers to make more sustainable products using abundant local materials?

Products of Place visualises a speculative near-future where an AI-powered design process generates products with materials that are locally abundant and specific to place.

This collaborative process between humans and AI draws on nature and data to empower designers to make better material choices, and encourages us to rebalance our relationship with the planet.

Explore the AI-generated plate concepts on the map, which range from beautiful to bizarre. Learn more.

SPACE10 is a research and design lab on a mission to create a better everyday life for people and the planet.

oio is a creative company working on products and tools for a less-boring future.

dynamicports.name: inputMappingScript

parameters.text: In an effort to envision a future where humans and other intelligences work together to solve our planets biggest challenges, Plotting Plates is a first simple step towards a more sustainable design process and manufacturing. An experiment with an artificial intelligence trained to identify abundant materials in certain regions, then used to generate truly local products, all different.

The generative algorithm simulates the process of emergence where natural products such as fruits, flowers and even animals, emerge from a series of local variables. By reducing transportation and bringing manufacturing closer to the consumer, Plotting Plates aims to be a more sustainable and ethical process.

parameters.text: Copenhagen has a large consumption of pig meat that create a large amount of food packaging waste that can be reused for new plastic products.
